channel.title: Shops question
channel.description: Hey, im making it so you can kill barrows and sell the items you get from barrows to a shop. And I want to change that amount that the shop buys it for. How can I change that? Thanks.

item.title: Shops question
item.dc:creator: @Xandra Xandra
item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

umâ€¦ it yeah ur right but it doesnt have a price that the shop actually buys it for, it has high and low alch, and sell price.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops question
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Config folder > Item.java > Ctrl F > Search for the items > Each item has a buy price, a low alch price, and a high alch price. One is the buy price. Just figure it out from there.

Read full topic
